title: Quarrel
description: You’re entire world can crumble in a single moment.How can you possible explain getting caught on your knees in front of your stepbrother?Is Allison’s life over?Who is standing behind her…she’s too afraid to look.But she knows that voice….On her knees in front of her rival,Her boss…Her STEPBROTHER.How will Allison survive this QUARREL?
author: Cynthia Sharon
